long_description: Ideal for light and fast alpine minimalists, the highly technical Arc'Teryx Beta LT mountain jacket also crosses over to urban environments quite easily. Made from exceptionally breathable GORE-TEX(R) Pro, this jacket is waterproof, windproof and rugged, yet supple and lightweight. Helmet-compatible StormHood(TM) with fast adjustment is designed to rotate with your head. WaterTight(TM) front zipper; adjustable cuffs. The Arc'Teryx Beta LT jacket features hand pockets and a laminated internal chest pocket with zipper.
short_description: Ideal for light and fast alpine minimalists, the highly technical Arc'Teryx Beta LT mountain jacket also crosses over to urban environments quite easily.
